package.name: DB_Table
package.summary: Builds on PEAR DB to abstract datatypes and automate table creation, data validation, insert, update, delete, and select; combines these with PEAR HTML_QuickForm to automatically generate input forms that match the table column definitions.

release.notes:
* BC BREAK: Oracle will not allow a sequence to start with "_". Default for DB_Table was to name sequences starting with "_", but no longer. Users of DB_Table should rename their sequences and sequence tables to remove the initial underscore; if you do not, the upgrade to DB_Table 0.23.0 will create a new sequence restarting at 1 with the new non-underscored name. Sorry, folks. This bug report was from Alex Hobart, who has been very patient in waiting for me to pay attention to it.
* Added 'autocomplete' as a supported element, per Alex Hobart.
